      • searchClassFullName

        public static java.lang.String searchClassFullName(java.lang.String classname,
                                                   java.lang.String fsFolderPrefix,
                                                   java.lang.String address)
        Search the full class name, using a class name, FS folder prefix and an address
        Parameters:
        classname - The class Name (e.g. lego-port, tacho-motor)
        fsFolderPrefix - The FS folder prefix, without the value [N] (e.g. motor, sensor)
        address - Port address (e.g. outA, in1)
        Returns:
        The full FS class folder name, with the same port address, if none, returns null
